title: Disabling Champions due to lore.
body:
Well that's some commitment right there XD

Too bad it is only GP.

replies.body: well uhm its till {{champion:41}}  some how revives and then its over :D

*respawn
> [{quoted}](name=TechnoFlame,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eJzgsYOy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-30T03:19:54.073+0000)
>
> well uhm its till {{champion:41}}  some how ***respawns*** and then its over :D
well {{champion:41}} probally is eating oranges in heaven now (or til he returns)

Just in case some of you are wondering why GP is "dead",
it might be related to the bugs mentioned in reddit related to GP:

1. If a Gangplank barrel is over a ward you cannot attack the ward. 
2. Friendly champions can attack Gankplank's barrels (using basic attack), but barrel won't be destroyed 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=akM2BYNJcvk

Reference: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3e63b9/514_patch_bugs_megathread/
Nope, he was disabled due to the events of Burning Tides: The Reckoning. His demise in the story and in-client has been planned for quite some time and wasn't a response to any gameplay issues.
so when is the plan for the demise of Teemo?
